title: PV System Owner Schema
description: Schema describing information collected about a PV system owner at registration

system_owner_full_name.description: System owner's full name - is stored encrypted to a non-public database

system_owner_address.description: System owner's address - is stored encrypted to a non-public database

system_owner_phone_number.description: System owner's phone number - is stored encrypted to a non-public database

system_owner_email.description: System owner's email address - is stored encrypted to a non-public database
